title: U.S. Women's Soccer Team Prepares For World Cup
teaser: All eyes will be on the U.S. team, which won the cup in 1991 and 1999 and is ranked second in the world. NPR's Rachel Martin talks to team member Megan Rapinoe, a midfielder for the Seattle Reign.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
